comment: really easy.. drops lowest test score, you can use cheat sheet. His test is same as study guide.(I mean..he just changes numbers, but questions are same.)If you study your study guide, you can make 100+ (include bonus question). No need to buy mymathlab & textbook.

If you have a hard time understanding math.  I recommend you get another teacher.  You can use a "cheat sheet" on the test.  Grading is fair. 10 questions on the tests with a bonus.  You have to be self taught b/c he is very vague...Not very helpful when you ask questions

EASIEST math class ever! I absolutely HATED precal before I came to his class, but he tries to make everything as simply and easy as possible for you! He also lets you use a cheat sheet for tests so that makes it even easier! If you're confused he explains in different ways to help you understand! He's simple, easy, and a great guy!

This class is easy. He sometimes skips steps but he answers any questions you have and will re-do problems over and over if you ask. he does a good job and accommodates you and your learning needs. You also can make a cheat sheet the entire front of a piece of computer paper which helped me get an A :) No book necessary

If you have trouble with math this is NOT the class for you. If you find teacher explaining every detail annoying, then this IS the class for you. He is young and relates better with his students. You get to use a "help" sheet on the test and there are two bonus questions. Good class to take overall.

He makes many careless mistakes that will affect you as a student because he will teach you the wrong solution sometimes. He knows what he is talking about but skips steps and often makes careless mistakes

Accessible, easy grader, easy on the eyes. Not always the clearest of explanations, but he's happy to stop & clarify if you ask. If you use a Mac you probably won't be able to access his study guides, but they're not 100% necessary.

He is smoking hott and really easy. He doesnt believe in homework. Your final replaces your lowest test grade. Its pretty straight. But if you like organization and clarity then dont take him. he will drive you nuts.

Mr. Baker is a good math teacher. I do not have the book or the online help and I'm making straight A's. The cheat sheet for each test helps a LOT and he goes over the tests. If math isn't your forte, get the online help. Otherwise, he's great.
he will work with you, cheat sheets for every test, doesn't always go over the little things, but he's a good teacher
Professor Baker is really awesome. He makes things really simple and really tries to help you out as much as possible. I wish he was teaching Calculus.
Great Professor! I made an A && i do NOT like math! Review session offered before exams. Plenty of practice problems. He makes the class easy!!

Pretty awesome teacher and fun to look at! =P It is true when he says the last two tests are WAY easier than the first two. As long as you pay attention and do the homework, it's an easy B. VERY glad I dropped Stats for Calc.

Teacher is very cute but not the best teacher. He thinks everyone understands how he got to an answer and may skip over the small steps. Attendance is not mandatory and he lets you use a cheat sheet for every test. Can skip the final if you get a 92 or higher average. Do My Math Lab!!

He is a very young teacher and seems to still be a little rough around the edges on his teaching. Notes are all posted online so attendance is not mandatory. Cheat sheets are allowed on tests and final can be exempted. I didn't love this class but I guess I didn't hate it either. He was alright.

Attendence isn't mandatory, and he lets you use cheat sheets for every test, including the final. You can also be exempt from the final. If you make a low grade on a test he lets you replace it with the final grade though. He's easy but confusing. I haven't learned any material. Only take if you're not interested in anything but a good grade.

I took him for elementary calc because i saw that he had good ratings, but DO NOT TAKE THIS TEACHER. He expects you to catch on very quickly and skips steps when explaining. He explains simple things in a very confusing manor, made calc difficult when ive never made less than an A in math. Only positive is the cheat sheet. all my friends agree.

He is a great professor. Posts notes online and goes over them in class. Is willing to answer questions and will help you individually if needed. He is very easy going. DON'T BUY THE BOOK. Always lets class out early which I love. He's also pretty hot :)
BEST Professor for this class!!! Take him, test are exactly what is covered in class,gives study guide, lets you use a cheat sheet,grading is fair, does curve! GET HIM!!!

You get to use one side of a sheet of printer paper as a cheat sheet on the tests, which really helps. There is also always a bonus that is unrelated to math. He also lets class out early a lot! Cons, he moves though the material pretty fast, ask questions. Haven't used the book at all, but  MyMathLab homework is due at the end of the semester.

This teacher is great. I recommend him to anyone. He goes through things fast, so you have to keep up, but I wish I could take this professor again. Homework isn't due until the end of the semester, but it helps you study before one of four tests and he lets you replace one test with the final. HIGHLY recommend taking him.
Class wasnt too hard. Test are short, so He puts powerpoints on line and doesnt require you to do my math lab but its extra credit.
If you go to class and take notes, you will get an A. He is always there to help you if you need help. oh and he is sooooo Hot

He isnt rusty, hes fresh out of college and has no clue what hes doing makes simple mistakes while teaching, talks about inapropriate things before class starts, is unable to show up to scheduled appts with students (he never showed to my appts) if you want a teacher who cares take someone else! dont be fooled by his looks, he is not a good teacher

You have to work for you grade thats for sure. Go to class to understand. Makes simple mistakes but corrects them. Book is useless unless studying for a test. Posts notes and reviews online. Do the reviews to somewhat understand the test. His tests are very tricky..

Eye Candy! Attendance not mandatory, never used the book once, seldom went to class. He posts all his notes online and gives study guides. If your grade is a high A you can exempt your final. Great first year math class! Take Baker and dont buy the book!
Mr. Baker is super smart and helpful.  Laid back, attendance not mandatory, definitely can get an A if you show up regularly and take a few notes. Def a guy you should take!

Prof is a nice helpful guy but it is really up to you to pass the class. you go to class around 25 mins a day where the lectures are very very brief and do not cover the extent of the material.the tests are over stuff that he has barely touched on in class and are a majority of your overall grade. If you want to teach yourself math, take his class.

He is AWESOME!!! Homework quizzes, Math XL, and tests. If you do homework and keep up with math XL, but dont do well on the tests your still fine and will make a good grade. He is very helpful inside/outside of class. He is soooooo HOTTTTT! Fun to look at during class..makes you pay attention

It was a little hard (that's what she said) paying attention in class, but he's really helpful. He is a great professor and knows his math. He might be new to teaching, but give him a chance. Highly recommend taking him, you will learn a lot and you will not be disappointed.

I can not tell you how much I enjoyed this class. The exams were easy, as long as you completed the homework, and there was a lot of silly busy work. I loved Mr. Baker, and he is so cute...I actually think were the same age, lol. He doesn't mind personally helping you and believe me you won't mind it either if you like getting help from a hottie!

This guy, was a bit rusty. Not in a trombone way, but more in the sultry sounds of a trumpet. His test were relatively easy, as long as you do your homework. The study sessions were great. Plus, it helps that he's good looking...wonder if he's single. Aside from my student-prof fetish, he really is a good professor.

Like the others said, rusty. He doesn't teach very well- Kind of just copies straight out of the book. But his quizzes are easy (HW basically), he cancelled Math XL halfway through the semester which rocked, and if you can teach yourself a little, his tests aren't bad at all. He will let you exempt if you maintain a high enough average too.

New to teaching, so a little rusty, but very helpful. Explains things well, and when you don't understand it he is very understanding and never gets impatient or upset. Highly recommend him. Very nice.

I found his teaching style awkward and he messed up a lot when he solved problems so look out for that and correct him. He is a nice guy and is very helpful. Overall the class is pretty easy and his teaching is a little rusty but that will get better with time cuz he is new and he provides a lot of help sessions. He requires no attendance.

I found his teaching style awkward and he messes up a lot when solving problems so make sure to let him know when he does mess up.He is really helpful though and has a ton of help sessions.Overall he is a really nice guy and is very helpful, but he is new right now so he is a little rusty when it comes to teaching.He does not require attendance.
